title: r/Askreddit Lawyers, What Was Your "HOLD IT!" Moment Where You Knew You Would Win?
description: r/Askreddit Are you ready for some intense court room drama? These lawyers of Reddit recount times when they absolutely knew they would instantly win the case. They catch liars on the stand, unveil dramatic evidence, and discover funny information that completely changes the case. Iff you like this video, be sure to subscribe for more daily Reddit content!
